faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: You can reset your password by using our automated system. Just provide your username and we'll send a temporary password to your registered email address.

faqs.question: Email not syncing on mobile device
faqs.answer: Check your internet connection, verify email settings (IMAP: 993, SMTP: 587), and try removing and re-adding your email account.

faqs.question: VPN connection keeps dropping
faqs.answer: Try switching VPN servers, check your internet stability, update VPN client software, and ensure your firewall isn't blocking the connection.

faqs.question: Computer running slowly
faqs.answer: Restart your computer, check available disk space (need >15% free), run disk cleanup, check for malware, and close unnecessary programs.

faqs.question: Printer not responding
faqs.answer: Check printer power and connections, restart print spooler service, update printer drivers, and clear the print queue.

faqs.question: Can't access shared network drive
faqs.answer: Verify network connectivity, check your permissions with IT admin, try mapping the drive manually using UNC path, and ensure you're connected to company VPN if remote.

faqs.question: Microsoft Teams audio/video issues
faqs.answer: Check microphone and camera permissions, test audio/video in Teams settings, update Teams app, restart application, and verify device drivers are current.

faqs.question: Software installation requests
faqs.answer: Submit a software request ticket with business justification. Include software name, version needed, business purpose, and urgency. IT will review and approve based on security and licensing policies.

faqs.question: Account locked out
faqs.answer: Account lockouts occur after multiple failed login attempts. Wait 15 minutes for automatic unlock, or contact IT support for immediate unlock. Consider password reset if you're unsure of current password.

faqs.question: WiFi connectivity problems
faqs.answer: Try forgetting and reconnecting to WiFi network, restart WiFi adapter, check for interference from other devices, and verify you're connecting to correct network with proper credentials.
